settings.text: You're seeing $19 instead of $97 because this is your first time here. Our system offers this price once to new visitors, then never again. Leave and you're permanently locked at standard pricing. 10,847 creators grabbed it immediately. The ones who "thought about it" paid 5X more the next day.

Your work looks too clean. We captured real CRT scanlines, color bleed and vintage glow from authentic tubes in 4K ProRes. Not filters. Not fakes. Just drag, drop and bring analog warmth to digital projects.

Digital is perfect. That’s the problem. Shot on expired Fujicolor Reversal with a vintage Bolex 16mm, these textures deliver real light leaks, unpredictable grain and organic distortions you can’t fake. This isn’t film behaving. This is film misbehaving.

Instant 8mm film magic with real Kodak grain and textures in 4K. No fake filters. Just authentic film grains and light leaks scanned from original Kodak stock. Turn any digital footage into warm, imperfect memories. Drag. Drop. Wow.

Authentic film overlays including burns, cinemarkers, sprockets and sound effects. Used by major brands like Nike and Balenciaga. Delivered in 4K UHD and ready for seamless use in any editing software.

Stunning light refractions captured on large-format glass with an Arri Alexa in 4K UHD. Designed with top DPs and lighting specialists to add seamless transitions and creative flare to any footage. Fully compatible with all major editing software.

Unlock the Master Bundle: 5000+ premium assets including LUTs, textures, fonts, transitions, effects and SFX. Our complete library in one pack, everything you need to elevate your visuals and bring any project to life.

Unlock the Master Bundle: 5000+ premium assets including LUTs, textures, fonts, transitions, effects and SFX. Our complete library in one pack, everything you need to elevate your visuals and bring any project to life.
Authentic 8mm and 16mm burns captured on real Kodak film in 4K UHD. Add raw cinematic texture, organic warmth and timeless grit that turns ordinary footage into film-inspired stories.
Unlock all current & future film assets with lifetime access. New textures drop weekly, yours forever.

settings.title: Frequently asked question
settings.text: Use this text to answer questions in as much detail as possible for your customers.

settings.title: Which editing software and apps are compatible with our products?
settings.text:
Our MASTER BUNDLE works with:

•⁠ ⁠Adobe Premiere Pro /After Effects
•⁠ ⁠DaVinci Resolve
•⁠ ⁠Final Cut Pro
•⁠ ⁠CapCut
•⁠ ⁠Filmora
•⁠ ⁠Vegas Pro
•⁠ ⁠LumaFusion
•⁠ ⁠Avid Media Composer
•⁠ ⁠CyberLink PowerDirector
•⁠ ⁠Movavi Video Editor
•⁠ ⁠HitFilm Express
•⁠ ⁠Magix Movie
•⁠ ⁠Pinnacle Studio
•⁠ ⁠Corel VideoStudio
•⁠ ⁠CINEVA AI Suite


It works on all versions of your editing software on both Windows and MacOS. Our bundle also works on all tablets and mobile apps.

Our assets are custom made for various editing software and apps by our team. This ensures that the assets will work perfectly on your preferred software or app with the matching files.

settings.title: Can I download the assets for multiple software programs and apps?
settings.text: Yes! After purchasing your product, you can download the packs for multiple software programs and apps from our download center. There are no additional costs involved, you get access to all downloads. So if you edit in both Premiere Pro and CapCut, you can download and use our packs for both.

settings.title: Which payment methods do you support?
settings.text: You can pay with Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal, Union Pay and Shop Pay.

settings.title: Can I use the assets on any kind of project?
settings.text: Yes, of course you can. Would it not be weird if you would not be allowed to? Creating awesome videos with our assets is what we are here for. There is also a commercial license included with your purchase.

settings.title: How will I receive my products?
settings.text:
After your purchase you will receive your products in 2 ways:

- First, you will receive a direct download link right after your purchase. With this link you are able to download it directly.

- Next to that you will receive an email with a link which will give you access to the download of your products. Perfect, because you may have bought it on your phone. (Please make sure you use a real and correct email address so that you will receive the goods correctly)

settings.title: Are there future updates to the assets included?
settings.text: Yes. We update all assets a few times per quarter. We also check whether everything is still working correctly.

settings.title: How do I install all the assets?
settings.text:
Our assets are very easy to use. Almost everything is just drag and drop into your timeline. Some assets require a one-time installation, which only takes a few minutes. You can see how to do this in the video installation guide.


This guide will be sent with your purchase. If you need more help, please contact our support team.
